channel.title: environment on TechnoStreet
channel.description: Recent content in environment on TechnoStreet

item.title: Growing concern over unseasonal warm spell in Europe
item.description: Growing concern over unseasonal warm spell in Europe Europe is experiencing exceptional temperatures even as it heads into the start of autumn.

item.title: Twenty young women from Chennai handpicked for climate change initiatives
item.description: Twenty young women from Chennai handpicked for climate change initiatives They will undergo a 10-month mentorship programme, which may be extended to other cities in Tamil Nadu

item.title: Migratory birds start arriving early at Kaziranga National Park
item.description: Migratory birds start arriving early at Kaziranga National Park Kaziranga Park is one of the largest homes of migratory birds, originating from Russia, the Netherlands, and Europe

item.title: NGT stops Corbett tiger safari work till panel submits tree felling report
item.description: NGT stops Corbett tiger safari work till panel submits tree felling report The NGT Bench said that the Forest Survey of India report on the matter clearly acknowledges the illegality in cutting of trees
